name: Altubreste
description: An ancient city built by a long-dead civilization of dragonborn, said to hold a powerful artifact in a highly hidden vault.

name: Fortune's Favor
description: Fortune's Favor was constructed as a base from which to record and catalogue things from other worlds that fall through rifts.

name: Hearth's Respite
description: A small standalone inn at the edge of a frozen wasteland. Hearth's Respite serves as a safe-haven for those traveling into the tundra.

name: Leatrom
description: A massive dwarven mining colony, and rival city to Stonweald. Some say that spending some time in Leatrom mines is the quickest way to find a fortune.

name: Peili
description: A city where the lines between realities are incredibly blurred.
